text: Mária Wittner (Gazdagh-Wittner; 9 June 1937 – 14 September 2022)1956 Hungarian freedom fighter Wittner dies aged 85 was a Hungarian revolutionary and politician. She took part in the Hungarian Revolution of 1956. She was a member of the Member of the National Assembly from 2006 to 2014. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Budapest
title: Mária Wittner
